entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Rain beginning before morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or a few flurries changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
